column1: The '''Ruffians''' were a group of [[Men]] from near [[Isengard]].
The Ruffians followed [[Saruman|Sharkey]] to [[the Shire]] in {{TA|3018}}.<ref>{{RK|Homeward}}</ref> They were his main operatives
column3: collecting the crop and surpressing any dissent. Many were killed in the [[Battle of Bywater]]; some were captured
column4: and some fled. Those who died were buried in the [[Battle Pit]].<ref>{{RK|Scouring}}</ref>

column1: A ruffian refers to a scoundrel
column5: brutal and unreliable person.<ref>[http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/ruffian Ruffian] Wiktionary entry</ref>
